title: Quick Tab UID Generation Pattern
details:
## Quick Tab UID Generation (v1.6.3+)

### ID Format
`qt-{tabId}-{timestamp}-{secureRandom}`
Example: `qt-14-1732774522337-a1b2c3d4e5f6g`

### Components
1. **tabId**: Current Firefox tab ID (prevents cross-tab collisions)
2. **timestamp**: Date.now() in milliseconds
3. **secureRandom**: 64 bits from crypto.getRandomValues() or Math.random() fallback

### Safety Features
- Uses `crypto.getRandomValues()` for cryptographic randomness
- Tracks all generated IDs in `this.generatedIds` Set
- Retry logic (up to 10 attempts) with collision detection
- Fallback ID with `-collision` suffix if all retries fail

### Key Files
- `src/features/quick-tabs/index.js` - QuickTabsManager class
- `src/core/config.js` - CONSTANTS.MAX_ID_GENERATION_RETRIES

### Methods
- `_generateSecureRandom()` - Crypto-secure random generator
- `_generateIdCandidate()` - Creates candidate IDs
- `generateId(maxRetries)` - Main ID generator with collision detection
